dct_title_s: Chicago suburban maps, Cook County, Illinois / Central Map, Survey and Publishing Co.
dct_description_sm: Fire insurance map hand colored to show building construction, locations of windows and doors, elevators, and available water facilities."
Also shows factories, commercial occupancy of buildings, property boundaries and house and block numbers.
Includes key to building colors and other features of construction.
Sht. 1 includes ""Index"" to towns, each section includes an Index map and ""Index"" to streets by sheet number.
"Evanston -- River Forest -- Altenheim -- Maywood -- Oak Park, Harlem, Austin and Ridgeland-- Blue Island -- Harvey -- South Evanston -- North Evanston.
116 maps on 58 pages: both sides, color
dct_publisher_sm: Central Map, Survey and Publishing Co.
